context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.

generation: explore all possible options to obtain the medication

explore all possible options like setting up a fund-raising campaign, inquiring about a payment plan with the pharmacy, discussing the situation with their healthcare provider, or applying for assistance programs that help cover the cost of certain medications
reach out to local community organizations, charities, and pharmaceutical companies for assistance
consider discussing financial options with the prescribing doctor, who might be able to offer a more affordable alternative or have access to programs that help with the cost of medication
research different avenues for financial assistance
explore all possible financing options

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh should do is to
generation: call a taxi, an Uber, or a friend to pick him up and take him to the airport
call a taxi, a friend, or a ride-sharing service like Uber or Lyft to get to the airport in time
call a taxi, an Uber, or any other car service to help him reach the airport on time
call a taxi, an Uber, or another type of ride service to quickly get him to the airport while he arranges for his car to be towed or repaired
call for a taxi, Uber, or Lyft while also calling for roadside assistance to take care of his broken-down car
call a taxi, an Uber, or another ride-hailing service to quickly get him to the airport
call a taxi or a ride-share service like Uber/Lyft to get to the airport as soon as possible
call for roadside assistance or a taxi to get him to the airport
call a taxi or use a ride-share app like Uber or Lyft to get to the airport
call for roadside assistance or a taxi

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.
context_2.prompt: One thing that Brian should do is to
generation: carefully recount the register in case he made a mistake in his previous count, and check with his employees to see if they made any mistakes or saw anything suspicious
contact his supervisor or the owner immediately to report the discrepancy
check the bakery's inventory and sales records to see if there was a mistake in recording sales
report the missing money to the owner or his superior
double-check all receipts, cash transactions, and records for the day
contact his supervisor to report the missing money
carefully recount the money in the register
contact his supervisor and explain the situation
notify his superiors about the discrepancy immediately
contact his supervisor or the owner of the bakery to report the discrepancy and ask for guidance on how to proceed

context_4.vignette: Mary is about to go to her final class of the day when she remebers that there is a homework assignment that is due. Mary's mom accidentally took her homework assignment out of her backpack when she was making room for her lunch. Now Mary has nothing to turn in for credit.

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.
context_5.prompt: One thing that Brad should do is to
generation: stay put and avoid wandering too far from their current location
stay in one place
stay calm and try to find a safe and visible place to start a signal fire using whatever dry materials he can find
stay where they are, especially if they are injured
stay in one place
stay put and create a visible signal for rescuers
stay put and avoid going any further, particularly if they are still on a marked trail, as this could increase their chances of being found by the rescue team
stay put and try to signal for help
stay put and try to stay warm while waiting for the rescue team
stay put and make a visible sign or signal for the rescuers
